content: shell edging crochet hat copyright august 2004 eileen tepper materials worsted weight yarn 2 strands at a time crochet hook size j chain 2 round 1 8 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook join round 2 chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet now and throughout half_double_crochet in same stitch 2 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet join 16 half_double_crochet round 3 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same stitch and in next half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet join 24 half_double_crochet round 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same stitch and in next 2 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 half_double_crochet join 32 half_double_crochet round 5 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same stitch and in next 3 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in next 3 half_double_crochet join 40 half_double_crochet round 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same stitch and in remaining hdcs adding only one more stitch somewhere in round join 42 half_double_crochet round 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet join round 8 chain 3 2 double_crochet in same stitch skip 2 half_double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next half_double_crochet join round 9-11 chain 2 half_double_crochet evenly around join round 12 repeat round 8 round 13-15 chain 2 half_double_crochet evenly around join round 16 chain 3 4 double_crochet in same stitch chain 1 skip 2 half_double_crochet 5 double_crochet in next stitch chain 1 join finish off
